input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Sportful Bomber Jersey'
  - Name='Santini UCI World Champion Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Supernova Heritage Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful/Castelli Snap Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Assos EQUIPE RS Aero SS Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Flyte Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Training Jersey 2.0'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Blurred Out Pro Hex Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Orbit Pro Air Cycling Jersey 2.0'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Pro Long Sleeve Merino Baselayer'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Midweight Thermal Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Gym Shirt'
  - Name='Tech Jersey - Conifer Chaos, 3XL | Cycling Jersey | Pedal Mafia'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Gym Shirt'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Pro Short Sleeve Merino Baselayer'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Short'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are cycling jerseys designed for performance rides, likely with durable and breathable fabrics. 'Bomber' may imply a different cut or style but generally similar function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini UCI World Champion Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance cycling jersey for serious riders, short sleeve, likely with moisture-wicking and compression features similar to the Core Jersey.
Another high-quality cycling jersey with performance features; likely similar in silhouette and purpose, though may differ in fabric specifics.
Technical cycling jersey made for performance riding, similar construction and intended use as Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos EQUIPE RS Aero SS Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Premium aero-focused short sleeve cycling jersey with compression and moisture-wicking, very similar in function to Core Jersey.
Performance cycling jersey with focus on fit and technical fabric, comparable to Core Jersey in features and purpose.
Training cycling jersey designed for durability and comfort in rides, aligns well with Core Jersey function and design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Men's Blurred Out Pro Hex Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance cycling jersey, possibly with unique graphic but overall similar intended function, fit, and materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Men's Orbit Pro Air Cycling Jersey 2.0
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Technical cycling jersey with advanced fabric and compression features, closely matching Core Jersey purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Pro Long Sleeve Merino Baselayer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Baselayer product rather than an outer cycling jersey; different construction and layering purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Midweight Thermal Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey but thermal and midweight, likely intended for colder conditions, so somewhat different in material and seasonality.
Gym shirt is a different product category, likely different fit, fabric, and intended for activities other than cycling.
Gym shirt is a different product category, likely different fit, fabric, and intended for activities other than cycling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tech Jersey - Conifer Chaos, 3XL | Cycling Jersey | Pedal Mafia
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey from same brand with 'Tech' likely indicating similar or advanced fabric and construction, very relevant.
Repeated gym shirt entry, still different product class and less relevant to cycling jersey.
Repeated gym shirt entry, still different product class and less relevant to cycling jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Pro Short Sleeve Merino Baselayer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Merino baselayer rather than an outer cycling jersey, different function and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Directly related cycling jersey product from the same Core line but long sleeve version; very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Short
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling shorts are part of cycling apparel but a different product type than a jersey, so less relevant.
